title: Why Everyone Hates Andrew Tate… the Fool break down
description:
This week on Fool Coverage — Laura went missing, Manny went on a date, the fool crew do a deep dive on Andrew Tate, there's a trivia rematch, and more!

Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733

More about the show:
